package.name: ncurses
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} make install DESTDIR=${TGTDIR} chmod -v 644 ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libncurses++w.a mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/lib mv -v ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libncursesw.so.5* ${TGTDIR}/lib ln -sfv ../../lib/libncursesw.so.5 ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libncursesw.so for lib in curses ncurses form panel menu do ln -sfv lib${lib}w.a ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/lib${lib}.a ; \ done ln -sfv libncurses++w.a ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libncurses++.a rm -vf ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libcursesw.so echo "INPUT(-lncursesw)" > ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libcursesw.so ln -sfv libncurses.so ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libcurses.so ln -sfv libncursesw.a ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libcursesw.a ln -sfv libncurses.a ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libcurses.a mkdir -vp ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/doc/ncurses-${PKGVERSION} cp -v -R doc/* ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/doc/ncurses-${PKGVERSION}
